name: SuperCatWorld
description:
I replaced all the graphics in the original super Mario bros with the cat from the cover image cat

NOTE : I did not make everything a cat, I just copied and pasted enough pictures of this cat to overwrite all the previous graphics. everything is a slice of cat.

pros to using this version:

platforms look cooler - bricks look cool - Mario is always big (not his hitbox or powerup state) - pipes still kind of look like pipes

cons : 

sky is no longer sky :(

Working on a version where all the code is this handsome cat
